conclusion: Analyze the velocity-time graph to find when areas under curves are equal.
Area under curve for Object A represents its displacement.
Area under curve for Object B represents its displacement.
Calculate displacement for Object A using triangle and trapezoid areas.
Calculate displacement for Object B using triangle and trapezoid areas.
Set total displacements for Object A and B equal.
Find time when displacements are equal at t = t4.
The two objects meet at time t4.
